name: Alone (itch) (bru_h)
description:
Made for the United Game Jam using Godot in 48 hours.

Story:

Pexel White goes missing One day.He was last seen at the tunnel entrance,the gate to hell(as those pexels used to say).Its upto Black,his friend to find him.

White finds himself deep inside the tunnels.Its upto him to get out of there..alive

-You play as 2 characters Black and White

-2 modes avaiable

-Game uses 2 colours only

-2 much fun

Character Abilities:

White:He can fly

Black:He can jump(does that count as an ability?)

Controls:

For right-handed players: Use the arrow keys

For left_handed players:Use WASD

Assets:

OutThere.ogg -----(by yd)---https://opengameart.org/content/space-music-out-there

Font-----(by mrmanet)---https://www.1001freefonts.com/vcr-osd-mono.font
